name: FMOD | Unity Demo - Paper Paintball
description:
A demo project meant to showcase the audio system of the game. The project is very rough around the edges (no win or lose state, some bugs in the actual gameplay), but the audio system works great! All audio implementation, game development, music and sound effects created by me.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow Keys/Middle Mouse Scroll: Move Camera
  • R/Scroll Up: Zoom In
  • F/Scroll Down: Zoom Out
  • Equals Key (=): Next Turn
  • Click and Drag a Unit (if it is their turn): Move Unit
  • Space (while mouse is over a unit): Display Combat Info
  • Click on Selected Unit: Perform Combat Action

Contact: kwaldonmusic@gmail.com
